title: Robotics and Programming with LEGO Mindstorms
description: Build and program your own EV3 robot! This course allows students to build and program the EV3 robots, implementing sensors and motors.

title: Minecraft Programming with MakeCode
description: Learn through block programming and make changes on your favorite game.

title: Minecraft World Building and Instruction Programming
description: Through the creation of the learning world, Minecraft command-line command control, and MakeCode graphical programming platform, gradually bring your child into the programming world.

title: Innovative Programming with MIT Scratch
description: Learn to create games and animations with Scratch. Scratch helps young people think creatively, logically, and work collaboratively, which are essential skills in the 21st century.

title: Robotics and Programming with SPRK
description: Learn how to program and control a robot, and enter the world of coding.

title: Javascript Programming 1: Minecraft MakeCode
description: Through the creation of the learning world, Minecraft command-line command control, and MakeCode graphical programming platform, gradually bring your child into the programming world.

title: Advanced Roblox Game Development and Lua Programming
description: Learn programming fundamentals and create your own games with Roblox Studio!

title: Mobile App Programming with MIT App Inventor
description: Learn how to program and develop mobile apps. Become the next young entrepreneurs
